summary: This document is a set of three consecutive shift logs from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, for July 20, 2019. It details routine operations, counts, and security procedures. A notable entry is that inmate 'I/M Burnett #76254-054' was at a local hospice/nursing facility under USMS guard, and there was a notification of a planned fight on the 11-South unit.

keyFacts: The log is for July 20, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
Inmate Burnett (#76254-054) was recorded as being at an outside medical facility (hospice/Goldcrest nursing facility) under US Marshals Service guard.
An outside caller notified the prison of a planned fight on the 11-South unit, leading to a lockdown.
The logs show routine security procedures, including body alarm tests, inmate counts, and equipment checks.
The document is marked CONFIDENTIAL and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files.
